column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH------ – A Chinese man has completely recovered from the novel coronavirus after his treatment in Sihanoukville. He will leave the hospital on Monday
column5: Health Minister Mam Bunheng has confirmed.------Jia Jianhua------
column7: arrived in Wuhan with his family of three in Sihanoukville on January 23
column9: he had an unusual fever and was taken by a health officer to test for coronavirus on January 27
column10: 2020 and placed in isolation in Preah Sihanouk Referral Hospital.------Minister Mam Bunheng expressed his joy and congratulations on the success of Cambodian health services.------According to law enforcement sources
column11: the Chinese man will also leave Cambodia on February 11
column12: 2020 after he is discharged from the hospital.------ Ministry of Health spokesman Lee Sovan also confirmed that as of February 9
column14: no new cases of the coronavirus had been identified. ------AREY
